title: Fraction
text: We want to include only values of the input that do not force the denominator to be zero.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: We can set the denominator equal to $$0$$ and solve for $$x$$. What is the value of $$x$$? (Separate the answers by comma)

title: Real Line
text: Now, we will exclude $$0$$ from the domain. The answers are all real numbers where $$x<0$$ or $$x>0$$. We can use a symbol known as the union, U, to combine the two sets.
